mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment_${url} (id, price, name, address, phone, memo) VALUES (#{id},#{price},#{name},#{address},#{phone},#{memo})

select ifnull(MAX(payno),1) from payment_${url}
INSERT INTO order_${url} (payno,id, pno, b_quantity) VALUES (#{payno},#{id},#{pno},${b_quantity})
mapper.select: select payno,b_quantity,joined.* from order_${url} o join ( select p.*, fullpath from product_${url} p left join product_img_${url} i on p.pno = i.pno ) joined on o.pno = joined.pno where payno=#{payno}
